# doseresponsemodels <img src="man/figures/logo.png" align="right" alt="" width="120" />

The `doseresponsemodels` package is a collection of DR functions  for qraLm

## Installation

You can install the `doseresponsemodels` development version from [GitHub: https://github.com/rpouillot/FoodsDR/doseresponsemodels](https://github.com/rpouillot/FoodsDR/doseresponsemodels) using the `devtools` package:



```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("rpouillot/FoodsDR/doseresponsemodels")
```
